description:
A student of Saint Lobelia Girls Academy, and the head of the White Lily Society, nicknamed the Zuka Club. ("Zuka" is an abbreviation of the Takarazuka Revue, a Japanese all-female musical theater troupe from the Hyougo prefecture.) They frequently perform stage productions, and make money by selling various club-related goods. They want to "rescue" Haruhi from the Host Club and attempt to convince her to come to Lobelia, but Haruhi refuses. Later, however, they do kidnap Haruhi and guilt trip her into performing in one of their stage productions.
Benio`s nickname is Benibara, or Red Rose. She notices that Haruhi is a woman at first glance. She is the star of Lobelia.
name: Amakusa Benio
